title: More probability distributions?
body_html:
Looking at the contributing guide and I'm currently here 🙂

I recently saw this PR here on PyTorch #3165 and was wondering if you're looking for more probability distributions to be added e.g. Poisson, Exponential, Geometric.

If so, I'd like to open up discussion about design/implementation of these distributions and which ones would be useful to add.
body_text:
Looking at the contributing guide and I'm currently here 🙂

body:
Looking at the [contributing](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) guide and I'm currently here 🙂 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8339018/31792467-2e184fbe-b4ea-11e7-8d23-b62adb1a268e.png)

I recently saw this PR here on PyTorch https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/3165 and was wondering if you're looking for more probability distributions to be added e.g. Poisson, Exponential, Geometric.

If so, I'd like to open up discussion about design/implementation of these distributions and which ones would be useful to add.
